name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 21, Henan. A Meituan deliveryman said that he spent 500 yuan on work clothes before joining the company, and the battery rental fee was 269 yuan/month; the electric car rental fee was 500 yuan/month. It was like paying for a job.
And he was injured in a car accident while delivering food at the beginning of the month. Not only did he not have insurance to pay, but he was also deducted 1,000 yuan. After resigning, his salary was also deducted.
The deliveryman said: I now feel that wearing this outfit is a shame.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 21, a pilot claimed that he was owed more than 500,000 yuan in wages by Guangzhou General Aviation. Currently, the company is operating normally and the legal procedures have been completed for more than half a year, but the wages are still not paid.
The pilot said: Where is the justice of the law? Where is the supervision of the industry?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added: Banks have huge insurance tasks for grassroots employees, and if they fail to complete them, they will be fined. As the year draws to a close, the bank's "opening red" campaign is even more frantic, with regular insurance supervision meetings and deposit insurance sprint meetings, requiring employees to actively recommend higher-yield insurance business to customers when they hear customers complain that their time deposits are too low. Even internal employees are reluctant to buy these insurances, but under tremendous pressure, they have to trick some elderly and less educated customers into buying them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 21, Shanghai. The man said that his child was bullied at Chongming Zhengda Middle School. He knelt down at the school gate and the hospital to seek justice, but received a call from the school asking him to delete the video.
The man said: "Don't I even have the right to protect my rights? I hope everyone can help me speak up"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 21, Hebei. The video shows that the family lives in a dilapidated house. The man has a disabled hand and can only bury his head in the bowl to eat. This scene is very sad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 20, migrant workers in front of the Changning County Government in Sichuan Province knocked on the door to demand their wages. On January 21, migrant workers in Caidian District, Hubei Province jumped off a building to demand their wages. On January 20, migrant workers from Shaanxi Sixth Construction and Zhenlong Construction demanded their wages. On January 21, migrant workers from Xi'an Chanba demanded their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 21, at the China Railway 20th Bureau, migrant workers demanded their wages. On January 21, at the China Railway 3rd Bureau Chengdu, migrant workers demanded their wages. On January 21, at the China Construction 8th Bureau 4th Company, migrant workers demanded their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: Phoenix.com reported: At the Foreign Ministry press conference on January 21, a US reporter asked: "Is China considering lifting sanctions on Rubio?" The Foreign Ministry responded: China will firmly safeguard its national interests, and it is necessary for high-level officials from China and the United States to maintain contact in an appropriate manner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 21, Beijing. A man who claimed to be a police officer at the Shunyi Branch of the Beijing Public Security Bureau was persecuted by Shunyi Court President Tu Changjiang, who helped to use false evidence and perverted the law by "using malicious words in the verdict to attack the identity of the police officer."
